inclusion.criterion: undergoing elective primary hip replacement surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: American Society of Anesthesiologists physical status 1-3
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: contraindication to spinal anesthesia (refusal, coagulopathy or recent use of anticoagulant medication)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: any other reason deemed significant by attending anesthesiologist
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: any patient requiring a wheelchair for ambulation or who cannot walk 25 feet with or without an assist device at time of surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: presence of neuropathy in posterior thighs or buttocks
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: use of greater than the equivalent of morphine 25 mg IV (oxycodone 30 mg PO) daily
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: any patient deemed a poor candidate for spinal anesthesia as determined by the attending anesthesiologist
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis and is on Levothyroxine. She has improved significantly after starting treatment.
